title: World Series Moves To Game 7 After Royals Grab 10-0 Win
teaser: The Kansas City Royals beat the San Francisco Giants 10-0 in Game 6 of the World Series, pushing the battle on to Wednesday for the final game. David Greene gets the news from NPR's Tom Goldman.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
